author: Deepa Seetharaman
title: Facebook to Launch Opt-In Dating Feature - WSJ
text:
Facebook Inc. will launch a new dating feature on its platform, CEO Mark Zuckerberg said on Tuesday, marking an unexpected push into a new business even as the social-media giant battles questions about how it handles user data.
Mr. Zuckerberg said the new feature will require users to opt-in and will be built with privacy in mind. He said 200 million Facebook users identify as single, and stressed that the feature would be designed “for building long-term relationships, not just hookups.”
... RELATED VIDEO The Key to Understanding Facebook's Current Crisis Facebook's current data crisis involving Cambridge Analytica has angered users and prompted government investigations. To understand what's happening now, you have to look back at Facebook's old policies from 2007 to 2014. WSJ's Shelby Holliday explains. Illustration: Laura Kammerman
